snippet: Warren Buffett's company is taking an even bigger bite of Apple stock and adding to its already sizeable stake in Phillips 66.

headline.main: Buffett's Company Adds to Stakes in Apple and Phillips 66
headline.print_headline: Buffett's Company Adds to Stakes in Apple and Phillips 66

snippet: HMD Global Oy, a new Finnish company looking to relaunch the Nokia brand for phones, said on Monday it has hired Pekka Rantala, the former CEO of Angry Birds maker Rovio, as its Chief Marketing Officer.

headline.main: Ex-Rovio CEO Hired to Bring Nokia Phones Back to Market
headline.print_headline: Ex-Rovio CEO Hired to Bring Nokia Phones Back to Market

snippet: After the social network streams its first N.F.L. game on Sept. 15, it will assess whether live streaming can be a linchpin of its future.
abstract: Twitter chief financial officer Anthony Noto says deal to live-stream National Football League games beginning in September will broaden their audience and bring in revenue from video advertising; company has made or is making similar agreements with other sports franchises as more marketers move from television ads to web promotions.

headline.main: With N.F.L. Deal, Twitter Live-Streams Its Ambitions
headline.print_headline: With N.F.L. Deal,  Twitter Streams  Its Ambitions

snippet: All three major U.S. stock indexes ended at all-time highs on Monday, extending their record-setting climb of the past few weeks as the dollar's weakness boosted commodity-related shares.

headline.main: Wall St. Ends at Record Highs; Commodity Shares Climb
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Ends at Record Highs; Commodity Shares Climb

snippet: Several big-name hedge fund investors soured on U.S. stocks in the second quarter and moved to gold and other bearish bets, failing to anticipate the stock market rally in the current quarter.

headline.main: Billionaire Investors Turn Bearish as U.S. Stocks Hit Record Highs
headline.print_headline: Billionaire Investors Turn Bearish as U.S. Stocks Hit Record Highs

snippet: The nation's transplant network is taking a long-awaited step to ease a serious disparity: Where you live affects whether you get a timely liver transplant or die waiting.

headline.main: US Organ Network Mapping a Path to Fairer Liver Transplants
headline.print_headline: US Organ Network Mapping a Path to Fairer Liver Transplants
